title: Vurgun
overview: Kemal is the owner of a huge holding, where money flows like water. A man who has a positive attitude towards the family, he loves his wife Reyhan very much, does everything so that their little son grows up in prosperity and love. Only, in the Turkish online series "Getting", those opponents appear who oppose feelings and try to turn the tide of events. Suddenly, a man named Vedat appears, who has repeatedly become a business partner, who, together with his brother Turan, are going to destroy all of Kemal's money. They, in order to hide the fraud and not go to jail, want to set fire to the office with all the securities, and then turn all the details onto their stupid enemy. However, they themselves did not understand how the man himself was closed in the office.
